text:
I wrote a xml file like this.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="Shift_JIS" ?>
<T_POI>
	<POI>
		<POIID>1</POIID>
		<Name>“ú–{Œê</Name>
	</POI>
</T_POI>

When I select "Name" by key is "POIID=1",the "Name" Value is correct,
but when i select "Name" by key is "Name='“ú–{Œê'",the result is nothing.
Can you give me some advise.
creator: luocx@ctdw.com.cn
luocx@ctdw.com.cn
text:
the "Name" value is a String of Japanese.
When I insert this value,the string was encoded.
new String("“ú–{Œê".getBytes("8859_1"), "JISAutoDetect")

creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
text:
Please try out 1.1 or the cvs head and reopen the bug if you have issues with 
that version.  If you solve the problem, please submit the patch in diff -u 
format.  If you can prove the bug, please attach a junit test.
